Regulation Name(s): Gastrointestinal microorganism multiplex nucleic acid-based assay
Analyte(s): Campylobacter (C. jejuni, C. coli, C. upsaliensis)
Shiga-like toxin-producing Escherichia coli (STEC, stx1/stx2, including E. coli O157 serogroup)
Giardia lamblia (also known as Giardia intestinalis, Giardia duodenalis)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for QIAstat-Dx Gastrointestinal Panel 2, a multiplexed PCR assay system for qualitative detection of viral, bacterial, and parasitic nucleic acids in preserved stool specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in the qualitative detection and identification of multiple gastrointestinal viruses, bacteria (including diarrheagenic E. coli/Shigella pathotypes), and parasites directly from preserved stool samples in Para-Pak C&S or FecalSwab from individuals with signs and/or symptoms of GI infection, for use with QIAstat-Dx Analyzer 1.0; results used in conjunction with other clinical, laboratory, and epidemiological data.
